snippet: Encountering the realities of pension costs, budget deficits and a scarcity of federal support, Mayor Bill de Blasio has struggled to please his supporters.
abstract: City Hall Memo; New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio is struggling to explain to his supporters that lofty liberal rhetoric of his mayoral campaign cannot be imported wholesale into City Hall; friction between de Blasio and his political base reveal growing pains of mayor who must answer to much large public than core of impassioned liberal voters who put him into office.
lead_paragraph: Encountering the realities of pension costs, budget deficits and a scarcity of federal support, Mayor Bill de Blasio has struggled to please his supporters.

headline.main: De Blasio Encounters Rising Friction Over Liberal Expectations
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Encounters Rising Friction Over Liberal Expectations
